com.dinggoapplication.CustomInterface

Class PixelUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dinggoapplication.CustomInterface.PixelUtil

  • public class PixelUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for converting between density independent pixel (dp), pixel (px) and other magical pixel units
    Version:
    2.1 Created by siungee on 09/03/15.
    Author:
    Lee Quee Leong & Seah Siu Ngee

      • dpToPx

        public static int dpToPx(android.content.Context context,
         int dp)
        Conversion from density-independent pixel (dp) to physical pixel (px)
        Parameters:
        context - Application context that store application resources
        dp - Integer value that contains the value for density-independent pixel (dp)
        Returns:
        Integer value that contains the converted value for physical pixel (px)
